channel.title: Strategic Moves on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Strategic Moves on FinanClub

item.title: DISH
item.description: score:10 Chances: DISH’s merger with EchoStar has created potential growth opportunities and financial flexibility for building a nationwide wireless network. Relocating employees and closing remote retail wireless offices could lead to more efficient operations and better business focus. Founder Charlie Ergen’s strategic moves to create a new kind of satellite and wireless data services company could position DISH for growth.

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:111 Chances: Medical Properties Trust has announced the sale of a significant interest in Steward Health Care System’s credit facility, which could indicate strategic financial moves. Despite the pitfalls, there might be investment opportunities for dividend investors in Medical Properties Trust due to the company’s high yield.
